name: Kill Him! Online Wars
description: Join the battle! Battle with other players from all over the world. You get cool maps,boss levels,zombie map with single player and online modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM. Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM. Storage: 600 MB available space
